import React,{useState} from 'react' const AddButton = () => { const [adding, setAdding] = useState(true) const [name, setName] = useState("") const [price, setPrice] = useState("") const [description, setDescription] = useState("") function addProduct() { setAdding(false) } return (
{!adding&&} {adding&&
Add new product
{setName(e.target.value)}}> {setPrice(e.target.value)}}>
}
) } export default AddButton
